description:
Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel - Ultimate Vault Hunter Upgrade Pack: The Holodome Onslaught is an action game. It was originally released in 2014. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel - Ultimate Vault Hunter Upgrade Pack: The Holodome Onslaught is available on PC.
